"No way," he whispered. Carefully, he reached forward with trembling hands to pick up the package. His hands closed firmly around the box and he brought it back and set on his lap. He did not want to screw this up...

He slid a finger under the fold along the side and brought up, breaking the tape along the sides. Excitement now getting the better of him, he finished unwrapping the rest in a less then a second. Inside was a box. Just a small plain box. Quite a mundane case for what could be the greatest invention in the entire world. He lifted the lid up and saw inside a small child's toy gun, surrounded carefully by small pieces of styrofoam so as to ensure that this wouldn't have been damaged. Joe cautiously reached in, knowing full well that this was no child's toy - he had read to many giantess stories on the internet to be fooled by its appearance.

Once, he had retrieved the gun, Joe began to examine it. At first glance, it looked entirely like a toy gun, but that was only at first glance. With further inspection, one would notice the various, buttons, switches, and triggers all over the gun. There were knobs for full body growth, and switches to control how much. There was the targeting pad allowing anyone to pick a certain body part and grow that. And then there were other buttons, that were a complete mystery to Joe.

Joe looked at the thing for almost 15 minutes before he realized that he was gonna be late for school.

"Shit," Joe cursed under his breath.

11311.title: Forget school, he's got a growth gun and he...

Joe decides to have a little fun with his new toy
11312.content:
"Hi, Mom. Bye, Mom," Joe said breathlessly as he ran out the door, grabbing an apple for the road. Quickly he jumped in his car, started the ignition and backed out of the driveway, almost running over the grass as he did so.

"Shit, shit, shit, shit, SHIT!!!!!" Joe screamed when he looked at the time. It was 8:15, and school started at 8:25 - no exceptions. He drove as fast as he dared down the road making sure there were no cops around to pull him over. Time seemed to go by faster then it should. It was already 8:20 and he still had two miles to go, in addition to getting his books ready for his first class. Trees zoomed by, the engine roared. This was the fastest he had ever gone. He only hoped that his old engine (it was his father's old pick-up truck before his) could hold up.

Finally he pulled into the school parking lot, jumped out of his car and ran inside - he did not want to have to meet, with his bitchy school principal, Miss Blanc. Although, she was hot as hell, she also took no crap from students, and had probably given more detentions in her two years in the position, than the oldest teacher at any school.

Joe burst through the doors, running for his locker. He looked at his watch - two minutes. While he was looking down he ran right into Miss Blanc, wearing one of her suggestively tight, low-cut, business attire. Everyone knew she was a slut - always trying to get with the male teachers, but none of them could possibly put up with her attitude, no matter how good-looking she was. They just didn't balance out.

"What the hell are you doing young man?" she asked.

"Uhh, um. I'm, uh, sorry, Miss Blanc..." he trailed off nervous as hell. "You see, I was running real late and have-"

"GO!" the principal shouted. "You're lucky I'm not giving you detention, but don't make me change my mind."

"Okay. Thank you." Joe quickly hurried away, breathing heavily. He quickly opened his locker, grabbed all his books, knowing that he didn't have enough time to pick only the necessary ones, and hurried off to class. He walked into his IB physics class just before the bell rang.

"Glad you could join us Mr. Smith," smiled Miss Cook. Miss Cook was the one faculty member in the school that could possibly match up to, or surpass the beauty of Miss Blanc, and because of that Miss Blanc hated her. She had natural platinum blonde hair, sky blue eyes and a HUGE natural rack - one that she never displayed in the slightest. Unlike Miss Blanc, Miss Cook was not a slut - yet another reason Miss Blanc hated her. Miss Blanc was one of those people that believe "If 'ya got it, flaunt it." Also, unlike Miss Blanc, Miss Cook was one of the nicest people that you will ever meet. Joe often had to stay after school with her in order to understand some of the more advanced aspects of her class, and she would always agree to stay.

"Huh? Oh, yeah, sorry about that. I'm here though," he said, still out of breath.

"Please take a seat," Miss Cook said, still smiling. Joe went to the back of the room where his best friend, Mike was sitting.

"Hey, Joe, what took you so long?" he asked.

"I forgot to set my alarm clock," Joe lied - no one except his girlfriend (Erin in case you forgot) knew about his fantasy. He turned away from his friend and began to listen to the lesson...
11312.title: Joe just barely gets to school on time

113122.content:
Joe sat their at his desk in the back corner of the room and carefully eyes everyone in the room to make sure that they weren't looking at him. It appears that most of the students have fallen asleep. A couple more are nodding off and the ones that are awake are either taking notes or just watching Miss Cook.

"Good" Joe thinks. Ever so carefully so as not to get noticed by Miss Cook who turns around every once and a while to explain the notes that she is writing up on the board, Joe pulls the size gun out from his backpack. He brings it up on his lap, so that it is well hidden under his desk. Joe looks around for a good target...

"Joe. Can you please stop staring at everyone and pay attention to the lesson?" asks Miss Cook eyeing you.

Joe's face turns slightly red. "I thought I was a little more stealthy than that." he thinks. "Yes Miss Cook, sorry about that...I...uh...I'm just a little tired today." he says.

"Its alright, but you really need to pay attention, it would really help your grade in this class." she says gently, not wanting to sound unkind. She turns back to her lecturing and notes.

"That's it!" thinks Joe, Miss Cook is the perfect target for growth. Joe (and nearly every other guy in the student body) has always wanted to see some more of what Miss Cook doesn't show, like for example her naturally perfect and large breasts. Growing her would acomplish this, she would grow straight out of her clothes. Joe aims the gun from under the desk at Miss Cook and pulls the trigger...

Does Joe only do a little growth at a time so that Miss Cook does not notice?

or

Does Joe just do a big spurt because he is too impatient?
113122.title: Joe decides to have a little fun with his new toy

choices: Bre, the hot senior
Miss Blanc, the hot teacher
1131221.content:
Joe couldn't help but call himself a genius. It was the perfect plan. All he had to do was take out the gun and fire. No one would notice because he sat in the back of the class. Once Miss Cook turned her back to write on the board again, Joe took the gun out from under his legs and took careful aim. Once he was sure on his target he let out a little zap - the trigger wasn't even held for more than a second - and put it back under his legs. A brief flash had lit up the room and everyone who was still awake looked around the room quickly before turning back around.

Joe looked at Miss Cook. It was hard to tell from so far away, but it definitely looked like she had grown a bit. By no means was it a huge spurt... you wouldn't have noticed it had you not been looking for it, but Joe was sure it had worked.

Once the confusion had settled down, and he was sure no one was looking, Joe took aim once again and fired, this time holding the trigger down a little longer. Now there was an obvious difference. Miss Cook had to bend down in increasingly large amounts to reach the spot where she had been writing. Her pants were creeping up her legs and her previously large sweater was tightening across her growing torso. The guys in the class had taken notice and were all staring intently at her ass now, forgetting about that flash. The girls too forgot about it as they were now wondering why Miss Cook was growing.

One more shot Joe decided. He looked at the gun trying to find a way to control sizes more accurately, and found one soon enough. Inputting the height he wanted her to to be at - 12 feet. Taking aim once more he got ready to fire. It was at this time one someone looked back for some unknown reason, and Joe had to quickly hide the gun again. The girl turned back around but not before giving you a funny look. This girl happened to be no less than the hottest girl in school (yes she's a senior... 18). Her name was Bre. She had slightly curly dirty blonde hair, an smallish but tempting ass, and a very large chest... one that was larger than Miss Blanc's (the bitchy school principal) formidable E's. However one could not compare her to Miss Cook, for Miss Cook's exact chest size had yet to be determined by the guys in school - it was only known that they were at least DD's, but could very well be bigger.

Once Bre had turned around again, Joe took out the gun and got ready to fire. But Bre was no dummy. She had seen something in Joe's hands, saw the bright flashes, and saw Miss Cook's growth which had still gone unnoticed by the teacher herself who was still writing on the board and talking to the student's behind her back. She had put it all together, and just as Joe was about to fire, Bre got up and walked across the path of the beam, asking Miss Cook if she could go to bathroom. FLASH, the gun had been fired... but who did it hit.

choices: He could invite over some of his female friends...
He could go outside to the park or the neighbors house and test the book...
He needs to babysit today...
1132.content:
Joe slowly opened the well wrapped package, carefully pulling back the cardboard flaps. He stared intently at what was inside.

"MAGICKA CENTRAL presents, The Book of Growth: Female Edition" It read in fine silver handwriting on the front cover. Just below it was a smaller caption; "Complete with spells, potions and incantations to fit all your growing needs!" He blinked a few times. This couldn't be real, he thought to himself. Erin has to be pulling a prank on me. He looked at the book again, scanning for any potential errors.

Joe narrowed his eyes; he couldn't find any imperfections on the cover, and it looked like it had been printed off by a professional company. "Very funny Erin," he said to himself with a brief chuckle. However his curiosity got the better of him, and he picked up the strange book, setting it on his bed.

Joe turned the cover page to see a long table of contents, divided into three main sections with a description under each;

Spells- A set of words usually followed by a gesture that trigger a direct impact on the world. (See more information about "Spells" on page 4)

Potions-Instructions on how to properly brew various magical liquids that have an affect on those who ingest them (Page 25).

Incantations- "Enchantments" for inanimate objects (such as clothing or jewelry) that trigger a spell when certain requirements are met (Page 43).

DISCLAIMER: None of the magic actions/substances described in this book have any affect on males. We're sorry.

Joe shook his head in confusing. For a practical joke, this was all really complicated. His curiosity perked up, and for just a moment he wondered if maybe, just maybe, this book was legitimate.

He got up and opened his bedroom door, peering out into the hall. For a minute, Joe wondered why the house was so quiet. He then recalled that his little sister Mia had a dentist appointment today, and his mother was accompanying her there. He breathed a sigh of relief. Joe loved his family, but it was nice to have the house to himself for an hour or two. He made his way downstairs and poured a bowl of cereal.

In the middle of his breakfast, Joe suddenly stopped eating as he realized something...
1132.title: A strange book

Joe realized that if he stopped by the park a few blocks from here or even somewhere around the neighborhood, he could see if the book is bogus or not. If it doesn't work, which it will not, nothing will happen. But, if by the slightest chance that it does actually work, he finally uncovered something of his deepest desires. Joe's mind began to wander of the possibilities, but he shook his head to regain composure. "Focus, man," he said to himself, "I don't even know if it works."

Joe headed to his room to swiftly get dressed, grabbed the book, and out the front door. The only thing is where should he go from here?

Joe decided that the park would be the place, that way if anything happens, he wouldn't draw attention to himself. After a brief couple minutes of walking, Joe made it to the park. It was quite lively today but not at all hectic, so he chose a bench nearby the entrance; in case it doesn't work and he could head home. There was a few groups of people that catches Joe's eye:
There was the decently sized playground with various age groups of kids; innocent fun to help a kid or two.
The gazebo had a few teenagers hanging inside and around it; maybe messing with them would be entertaining.
Lastly, just looking around the area, he could see other people sitting on benches or walking along; Joe would have to get up to investigate further options.

Which one shall our curious hero test the book on?

choices: Skylar is growing first, as she was closer to the book...
She is just stretching, but Katelyn is feeling strange upstairs...
11323.content:
"Oh crap," Joe quickly finished his cereal and ran upstairs, pulling on a pair of Khaki pants and a white polo shirt. He almost forgot he had to babysit today at 10:30. Joe looked down at his phone; it was nearly 11:00. He finished getting dressed and grabbed his backpack, throwing it over his shoulder. He paused for just a moment when he saw the "Book of Growth". May as well, he thought to himself as he swiftly shoved the book into his backpack and closed the zipper...

Joe stood outside the Morgan residence, looking down at his phone for just a moment. 11:14, not too bad. He reached above the door-frame for the spare key and quickly opened the door. A rush of warm air passed by him as he entered the living room, taking in the familiar red couch and maroon carpet as he turned to set his bag down.
He had just closed the door when he detected a rapid series of foot-steps, getting louder.

He spun around just as a little girl dressed in a blue t-shirt and gray yoga pants leaped onto him, throwing him backwards against the door as she gleefully wrapped her arms around his neck.
She laughed as she held on to Joe in a warm embrace. "Gotcha!" she cried between fits of giggles.
Joe gave an exasperated sigh and looked down to meet her eyes, before gently hugging her back. "Now Skylar, you do this every time I babysit you. It's really not that funny anymore." he inquired, though he couldn't help but smile.
"Yes it is!" she giggled some more.

Joe patiently waited for her to calm down before gently setting her down. Skylar was was an endearing young girl, though she could be very overzealous at times. She had just turned 9 (and a half) years old, and stood at 4'6, with long blonde hair that resembled her mother's. Her feet were bare, as usual, and her big green eyes looked up at Joe with delight. Despite her rambunctious nature, he knew that she was actually very sweet most of the time.

"Sorry I'm late Sky," Joe inquired "Hey, can you tell me where your sister is?"

Sky rolled her eyes, gesturing to the staircase. "She's in her room, as usual" she stated with a loud sigh.

Joe heared another set of footsteps coming down the stairs, this one a much softer and slower pattern than the first. He smiled as a 4'11 girl entered the room. "Hi Kate." he greets her.

Katelyn was the apparent anti-thesis of her younger sister. At 12 years old she wore a distinctive pair of glasses that matched her brown hair and blue eyes. While Sky had several friends over each week and couldn't be left alone in a room for a half-hour without going crazy, Kate always preferred her books and her music. She was very shy with almost everyone she didn't know, as it had taken about a week for her just to talk to Joe. She seemed to spend most of her free time in her room, and was slow to make friends. However, as Joe had found, behind her highly reserved and shy tendencies was a caring and gentle personality. After 2 months of babysitting, she had warmed up to him quite a bit.

Katelyn returned his smile. "Hey Joe." She said softly as she walked over and gently embraced him. Joe hugged her back, and she blushed a little bit. He waited for her to let go, before stepping back and announcing his plans.

"Alright everyone, sorry I'm late, I had some business to take care of on my end. Are you two hungry?" He asked. They both nodded.
"How bout I make some Mac and Cheese now and we can go from there?" Joe proposed

Skylar's face lit up as she jumped up and down with excitement. "Awsome!" she exclaimed.
Katelyn gave a half smile. "Cool." she commented softly.

"Ok," Joe concluded "This will just take 10 minutes or so."

...

About half hour later, Joe plopped down on the living room chair, right across from the sofa. Skylar was lying on the couch with her eyes closed, her open mouth breathing softly and rhythmically. After a big meal and several laps around the house, she was fast asleep. Joe had draped a blanket over her small frame.

Katelyn had gone back to her room, and was presumably listening to music. Joe realized at that moment that he didn't really have much to do. With boredom starting to creep into his mind, he suddenly remembered the book in his backpack. He leisurely pulled it out and set it on his lap. Joe opened it up to a random page and started reading. "Basic Growth Spell," he read silently, "This is a simple but fun spell that's easy to cast. Perfect for beginners! First, find an enclosed area,
such as a building or house. This spell causes every female in the enclosed area, to proportionally grow between 3-4 feet taller. Make sure there is adequate space for growth to happen. Spell only affects living human tissue." Joe scoffed softly at the seriousness of the instructions, but he did recall that the house has 10 foot ceilings. He kept reading, "To cast spell, speak the words in the presented order, enunciating clearly." Joe stopped for a second, but his curiosity got the better of him. He scanned through the "Spell", which turned out to be about 3 lines of apparent gibberish. Might as well, he thought to himself, before softly reading the phrases out loud.

As Joe's eyes were glued to the page, he failed to notice a dim pink light, growing brighter with each word he read. After the last phrase, he looked up and gasped. In the center of the room was a bright pink ball of energy. His eyes widened as he stared at it in shock, wondering what the heck was going on. Suddenly it flashed and seemed to explode into tiny particles of light. Then, they seemed to split, half of them shooting up the stairs, while the other half gathered around Skylar's sleeping form. Joe's mouth was wide open, and he quickly blinked.

When Joe opened his eyes, everything looked...completely normal. No balls of energy, no beams of light, just some rays of the afternoon sun shining through the window. He breathed deeply, and realized that his heart rate was though the roof. Closing his mouth, he looked around again and saw nothing out of place. "Did I hallucinate?" he asked himself.

Joe's gaze suddenly turned to Sky as she let out a soft moan. He noticed her feet were no longer covered by the blanket, and they almost appeared to be inching forward across the sofa.

"Oh my god..." Joe froze "Is she...growing?"
11323.title: He needs to babysit today...

Upstairs, Katelyn was listening to some music and was unaware of the glowing pink orb behind her floating in mid-air. ♫ Grow baby, GROW! You gonna outgrow the whole world Baby ♫

As Joe held the Growth formula in his right hand, a thought crossed his mind, "Who would be a good test for this stuff?" It was then he could hear some noises coming from upstairs. It was his little Sister and Mother awakening.

Joe looked around where he could pour the formula in. As he couldn't just flat out ask his little sister to drink some growth juice. But when juice crossed his mind, he then knew where he wanted to pour the contents in. He remembered his little sister loved milk as she wanted to get bigger and mom always told her how milk helps you grow.

So Joe quickly poured a glass of milk and poured a very tiny amount of the Growth Formula into the milk. It temporarily turned pink in color, but quickly faded back into it's natural white color. Just as his little sister and mother stepped into the kitchen! Joe stuffed the vile back into his pocket as he greeted his family, "Hi mom, hi Mia, how did you two sleep?"

With a big yawn, his mom picked up the coffee cup closest to her, "Oh I did well, thank you for asking son. Also thanks for the coffee."

Joe smiled, "Oh it was nothing, just thinking about you."

Mia rubbed her eyes after yawning as well and noticed a glass of milk sitting on the table in front of her. She immediately grew excited and asked her Joe if it was for her. Joe smiled and gave her a nod. Mia grabbed the glass of milk and chugged it down.

"Mia, don't chug. That's rude... plus you didn't thank your bother for pouring you a glass of milk sweety." Katherine explained.

Just as Mia gulped the last drop of milk, she burped softly and apologies for her rude manners and then thanked Joe for pouring her some milk. "No problem little sis, just trying to help you grow." Joe said while trying not to laugh at the last part he said.

Katherine started to cook breakfast as her kids sat at the table awaiting for her to finish cooking bacon, eggs, and a few other common breakfast items. However, while she was cooking. Mia was the only one watching her mother cook. Joe on the other hand was watching his little sister like a hawk. Wondering when or if anything was going to happen to his sister.

After a few minutes,Katherine had finished the first set of breakfast and placed the plate in front of Mia.

Opening her purse slightly to catch a peek inside she saw the little thing had woken up. For her everything had to be shaking as she tried to sit upright while keeping her balance. Perplex from waking up in such a dark, tight space she seemed to be checking her surroundings. Crammed in with a lipstick the size of her leg, a wallet roughly the same size as her and a box of tampons among other things. The diminutive girl craned her little neck up at her only light source as she instinctively held up her hand before her eyes, trying to protect them from the sudden beam of light shining on her. "It's okay. You're safe for now. Try to relax." Deb said before zipping up her purse again, leaving the tiny girl in darkness.

Later at home Deb wasted no time going to her room, opening her purse and tossing its content on her desk, causing her little captive to fall flat on her face and give out a weak yelp. Sitting down at her table, Deb out reached her arms and put them down on the surface next to the small girl, trapping her between them. Much to the girl's relief, she only did this to push any unwanted objects to the side of the table.

There she was standing now. A living, breathing human being striped of her dignity by being reduced to the size of a doll standing on another girl's desk, looking up at her. The rather thin girl was clad in a dark blue sweatshirt combined with a short red tartan skirt. She had straggly, waist-length, toffee blonde hair, pale skin and innocent blue eyes.


"Who are you?" the puny teen asked in a sheepish tone, finally gathering up the courage make an attempt at breaking the silence between the two.

Meanwhile, Deb remained silent, staring her little catch down trying to take in the fact that not only was a person the size of an action figure standing on her desk, but that a creature of her size was also able to speak.

All the while this was clearly making the tiny girl uneasy, "C..Can you help me get back to my family?" she asked with a stutter.

All of a sudden Deb once again reached her arm out above the girl, making her fear the worst whilst she gave out a startled squeal and braced herself for impact. Deb however, not paying any mind to how her simplest movements were terrifying to the helpless soul below her, was merely going for her penholder at the back of her desk. She spooked the girl once again by abruptly putting down a wooden ruler right next to her to measure her height. "Stand straight for a second, would you?" she said bluntly as her subject was still a little whimpery from suddenly being dwarfed by an everyday object, let alone the earsplitting sound that it made when it hit the table an inch away from her fragile little ears. Deb awaiting the teen girl to do as she said and adjust her posture she decided she wasn't gonna wait any longer as she got a good grip on her shoulders and pushed her torso upwards, trying not to squeeze her too hard, forcing her to stand upright so she could properly measure her. Deb wasn't surprised to see that her little discovery was standing at only just about 5 and a half inches tall.

"What's your name, little one?" she asked nonchalantly while took a photo of her next to the ruler, blinding the poor thing with the camera flash.

"My name is....," she said rubbing her eyes, trying to recover from the temporary blindness the much larger girl carelessly put her through, "...I'm Abigail."

"Well, hello there Abigail," Deb said sneeringly, "you are one tiny girl."

To this she said nothing, only taking a few steps back wondering what will happen next.

Delighting in the way little Abigail was looking up at her in complete awe she said "My name's Deborah."

info.description:
Been meaning to update/personalize these rules for....almost half a year, so here it is:

Giantess and growth/expansion themed storyline here, with exmphasis on extreme sizes--please try to avoid shrinking down what other authors have grown...if the phrase "more manageable size" comes into mind when you're writiing an addition....you should maybe consider writing it elsewhere--I'll not be a true Nazi about it, though: if you can work it in decently and in keeping with the spirit of things, I'll prolly allow it.

What I won't allow is crappy, single paragraph(or less) episodes--please do try to at least match the length and detail level of the author who preceded you (honestly, think about it, how likely is it that that author who wrote 10 paragraphs worth is going to write ten paragraphs more in response to your epic saga of "How big does she get? A. Big. B. Very Big. ? )

Encouraged: GTS, breast growth, fat growth, butt expansion, muscle growth, and most any type of growth, really...along with most any type of sex. I'll ask for no Mom stuff or actual scat (I'll allow farting and watersports so long as its decently written and still adheres to the growth/expansion theme)

Ending the story will not be tolerated...I'll edit it and make up continuation options for the ep if it's too good to be deleted, and maybe, maybe, edit/fix "grammatically flawed" ones, too. Don't expect much of that, though--if you find your episode deleted and you _don't_ get an message from me explaining why....assume it's because you're in dire need of a remedial English course.

That said, go nuts, have fun!
